FuncDef: This command configures the lifetime of explicit mappings made by the PCP servers.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the minimum lifetime of explicit mappings made by the PCP servers using this PCP policy, in seconds. Values-60 to 86399.
Specifies the maximum lifetime of explicit mappings made by the PCP servers using this PCP policy, in seconds. Values-61 to 86400.
